title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 694.6 - Fees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 694.6 - Fees

State Regulations
(a) When authorized by statute the director may request that the court award the
service a reasonable fee. (b) The director's requests for fees
shall be based upon a rate of compensation of $30 per hour. (c) Fees awarded the service
shall be maintained and dispensed in accordance with law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
694.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
